Instance.description: The open street director class used for the Jungle Adventure pack.

TunableTuple.name: clear_path_interaction
TunableTuple.description: A reference to the interaction that a Sim runs in order to clear the path obstacle so they can use the portal.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: num_of_paths_available
Tunable.description: The number of paths that are available when a vacation group arrives in the jungle for the first time.

Tunable.name: path_clearing_commodity
Tunable.description: The commodity that has to reach 100 in order for a path to be considered clear.

TunableList.name: path_obstacle_data
TunableList.description: Tuned data for the path obstacles in the open street. This includes which conditional layer the path obstacle is attached to and what state that layer is in when the obstacle is locked.

TunableTuple.name: obstacle_data
TunableTuple.description: All of the data associated with the path obstacle.

Tunable.name: always_available
Tunable.description: If True then this particular path obstacle is always available to be cleared and traveled through. If False then this path obstacle is subject to randomly being available or unavailable depending on the travel group.

TunableList.name: layers
TunableList.description: A list of conditional layers and the status the layer starts in (visible/hidden) that are associated with this path obstacle.

TunableTuple.description: Data about which conditional layer the obstacle is associated with and what state it is in.

Tunable.name: conditional_layer
Tunable.description: A reference to the Conditional Layer found in the open streets.

Tunable.name: immediate
Tunable.description: If checked then the layer will load immediately. If not checked then the layer will load over time.

Tunable.name: visible
Tunable.description: Whether or not the conditional layer is show/hidden when the corresponding path obstacle is locked. Checked signifies that the layer is visible when the obstacle is locked. Unchecked signifies that the layer is hidden when the obstacle is locked.

TunableEnum.name: obstacle_tag_id
TunableEnum.description: A tag for a specific path obstacle object that we might want to mark blocked or access_PermanentlyBlocked.

Tunable.name: path_unlocked_state
Tunable.description: The state the blocked path obstacles should be set to if they are unlocked.

Tunable.name: permanently_blocked_state
Tunable.description: The state the blocked path obstacles should be set to if they cannot be cleared.

Tunable.name: treasure_chest_closed_state
Tunable.description: The state that a treasure chest is in when it is still closed.

Tunable.name: treasure_chest_open_state
Tunable.description: The state that a treasure chest is in when it has already been opened.

TunableEnum.name: treasure_chest_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag used to identify a treasure chest.
